argument.name: data
argument.description: Choices to add to dropdown boxes

argument.name: clearExistingData
argument.description: Logical. Whether or not to clear out pre-existing choices in the dropdown box.

page.discussion: Same as the .populateDropdownBox() method, but operates on a control that is in a Repeating Section. The choices in the DropdownBoxes in every row in the Repeating Section are updated. See {dialog.object}.populateDropdownBox() Dialog Component
